start.phrase: Converting ideas into memorable digital experiences...

about.title: A little about myself
about.text1: Currently, I am a full stack developer, focusing on front end development. When developing my applications my focus is to transform ideas into functional, attractive and responsive interfaces.
about.text2: My front end development stack is based on Next.js, Sass and TypeScript. With this stack I build modern and efficient applications. I am always aiming to understand user behavior to provide the best experience when accessing my applications.
about.text3: On the back end, I use Django to create robust and scalable solutions, ensuring that the system works in the best way possible in conjunction with the front end.

front.title: Full stack development
front.desc: With specialized skills in full stack development, I'm familiar with technologies such as Next.js, SASS, Django and JavaScript, which form the solid foundation for creating engaging and responsive digital experiences. In addition to mastering these tools, I have an innovation-oriented mindset, constantly seeking creative ways to improve the design and functionality of applications, ensuring that each project exceeds expectations and offers an exceptional experience to users.

seo.title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
seo.desc: With comprehensive knowledge in SEO (Search Engine Optimization), I can optimize every aspect of web development to ensure high visibility in search engines. From properly structuring HTML to creating relevant content and optimizing meta tags, I am committed to driving organic traffic and improving rankings in search results, thereby increasing the visibility and reach of the websites I create.

uix.title: User interface and experience (UI e UX)
uix.desc: With a strong understanding of UI (User Interface) and UX (User Experience), I can design intuitive and engaging digital interfaces that deliver an exceptional user experience. By focusing on usability, accessibility and user satisfaction, I can create designs that not only visually impress, but also maximize efficiency and ease of use. UI and UX are essential to ensuring your website visitors have a positive experience, resulting in greater engagement, retention and conversion.

responsive.title: Responsive design
responsive.desc: With experience in responsive design, I have solid skills in creating interfaces that adapt perfectly to different devices and screen sizes. Using advanced techniques in HTML, CSS, Sass and the Next framework, I can ensure that each project looks flawless on any device, providing a consistent and intuitive experience for users, regardless of the device they are using.

1.desc: This portfolio project was designed as a platform to showcase and highlight my skills and experiences, as well as showcase my projects. With a minimalist approach and focus on usability, the design is clean and intuitive, allowing visitors to navigate easily through the sections and obtain relevant information in a clear and organized way.

2.desc: The TecnoBurguer project is a centralized management system developed to optimize a restaurant's operations, offering effective solutions for both employees and customers. From the conception of ideas and definition of business rules to the creation of screens and final implementation, this system was designed to provide an integrated and intuitive experience.

3.desc: The project consists of a Restful API that aims to create events, integrated with Google Calendar. That is, events created in the application will be reflected in the user's Google calendar.

policy.welcome: Welcome to our cookie policy! Here we want to inform you about how we use cookies on our website to improve your browsing experience.
policy.responsewhat: Cookies are small text files stored in your browser when you visit our website, and they are intended to improve your browsing experience.
policy.responseessentials: Essential cookies are essential for our website to function. They are only used to remember whether you have accepted or denied the use of optional cookies. These cookies do not collect personal information and cannot be disabled.
policy.responseoptionals: Optional cookies help us improve your website experience by remembering your preferences, such as your chosen language. They are not essential, but they allow us to personalize content to suit your preferences. You can choose to allow or refuse these cookies.
